Awesome corner unit 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Good size living area with lots of sunlight Separate kitchen area Heat and hot water included Live in super
Great location ? near JMZ trains and countless locals restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. The Rosemont, Williamsburg Pizza, Fiction Bar/Cafe, Domino Sugar Factory Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Pies-N-Thighs, Peter Luger, etc
Small pets welcome

Huge pre-war 1 bedroom!
- rent stabilized
1 large bedroom 1 big living room (with windows) Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances Elevator building Heat and hot water included
Small pets OK Available June 1 Broker fee applies

Extra large renovated sunny 2 bedroom available now in Williamsburg! Large eat-in kitchen with new appliances. Newly renovated bathroom. Huge living room, will fit all of your furniture! 2 large bedrooms with closets. Excellent location! Just two blocks to the Marcy JM express (15 minutes to midtown Manhattan!).
Heat and hot water is included Pets welcome 12/1 move in No broker fee

Incredible 3 bedroom - right by the park!
- 3 bedrooms - 1 bath - hardwood floors - heat and hot water included
Around the corner from Prospect Park! Pasta Louise, Nighthawk Cinema, Dog Day Afternoon, Fonda, WINNER Cafe, Greenwood Park Bar, etc all nearby. Close to F and G trains for easy transportation.
No broker fee Available 11/1 SMALL pets OK

2br duplex with basement for additional storage! Shared courtyard Hardwood floors Modern renovations Amazing location If you need a lot of space, this is the one. See video. Note additional toilet in the downstairs bathroom has been capped off to avoid any flooding issues. No fee pets ok Call or text to see right away

Spacious, beautifully renovated 3 bed with MASSIVE outdoor space !! Prime Bushwick ? Elevator building with garage parking and laundry
Located near Morgan L and Flushing JM, near Maria Hernandez Park and steps from great bars, restaurants and shopping
Features: - Central Air - Huge outdoor space (see video) - Elevator - Laundry Room - Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan - Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances - Hardwood floors - Garage with Zip Cars
?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE! Contact Tyler to view

Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Everything you?ve been looking for in Bushwick is right here! This 2nr floor, two bedroom in a fun neighborhood has original wood molding details and plenty of windows to allow the natural light to flow in. Massive living room with a window bringing in natural light. Cross the street and sip your morning coffee at Maria Hernandez park. Enjoy the multitude of neighborhood cafes and bars. No need to worry about commute times, the Jefferson L train stop is just two blocks from your door. All this and pet-friendly too!
No fee pets ok Call or text to set up a viewing

2 Bed w/ 4? ? 14? private terrace in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Parking is subject to availability ($300/mo extra for designated spot) Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok! NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in!
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Large living room. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building ($300/mo)- Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. 77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

Beautiful 2-Bedroom with City Views in Stuyvesant Heights!
Located at 930 De Kalb Avenue, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath apartment combines modern comfort with historic charm in the heart of Stuyvesant Heights.
Apartment Highlights:
Spacious bedrooms with ample room Sleek bathroom with stylish finishes Unique design elements across floors Elegant white marble staircase Building Perks:
Rooftop with stunning Manhattan skyline views Surrounded by historic brownstones Quick 25-minute commute to the city Close to J, M, and Z trains for easy transit Simple application process; guarantors accepted.
Don?t miss out on this mix of modern amenities and classic charm in one of Brooklyn?s top neighborhoods! Schedule a visit today!

-Spacious unit with an amazing layout!!!
-Queen sized bedroom with closet space
-Fully renovated kitchen features brand new Stainless steel appliances
-Heat/Hot Water Included
-J/Z/A/C train accessible (Few blocks away)
-Amazing neighborhood with ample things to do! Restaurants, bars, juice bars, etc..... Casa Blanca lounge, Saraghina, and Peaches all within arm's reach. Pet spa right around the corner!
-City less than 20 min. away on any train
Cal/Text/Email to set up a viewing

The Residences at 1127 Flatbush Avenue sit conveniently at the intersection of two of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods?Prospect Lefferts Gardens and Ditmas Park. Life at 1127 Flatbush is a luxury you can afford.
Designed with its residents in mind-360 degree rooftop views of Brooklyn, Manhattan and Queens are only an elevator ride away from your green communal courtyard, laundry room, on-site storage lockers, and fully secure bike room.
Each apartment is s thoughtfully considered balance of space and light. Studio, one, and two bedroom layouts all apportioned with in-unit climate control, dishwashers, and stainless steel appliances. Many units also provide private outdoor space overlooking your neighborhood.
Lifestyle 1127 Flatbush provides an authentic Brooklyn experience, sitting at a cultural crossroads representative of its borough. A short distance from Brooklyn?s Prospect Park, the King?s Theater and Ditmas? Park?s restaurant, shopping and nightlife-fueled Cortelyou Road, residents at 1127 Flatbush will enjoy not having to go far from home to experience the best of Brooklyn.

With Atlantic Ave and Eastern Parkways to the north/south Enjoy the old school vibe meets new school renovation and bustle of the historical Crown Heights neighborhood in this beautifully renovated building!Conveniently located off the A, C, 2, 3, and 4 trains as well as the B15, B45, B46, and B65 bus lines.Central A/C and HeatOutdoor SpacesLaundry in the Building

Open and roomy layout Sleek kitchen and bathroom design Beautiful hardwood floors Generous closet space In-unit washer and dryer Arrange a visit today and step into your future home!

Lovely two-bedroom apartment available right off of Nostrand Ave nestled away on a tree-lined block! Private yard!
Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with spacious layout, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. Heat and hot water included.
To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Short distance to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela?s, Dutch Boy, Cent?Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady?s and more!
Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.
Available now Cats only (no dogs, sorry)

NOW WITH NO BROKER FEE!!
The Kent House is in arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door.
Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Washer/Dyer IN UNIT Excellent light from extra large windows

BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First & Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

Stunning 3-bedroom unit in prime Bushwick location, steps from L/M trains. Queen-sized bedrooms, spacious living room with dining area. Modern amenities: central air, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher. High ceilings, hardwood floors, ample closet space. Pet-friendly, video intercom, laundry. Quick 22-min commute to Union Square. Nearby bars, restaurants, supermarket, and park. Guarantors accepted. Virtual/live tours available. Don't miss out!

Welcome to 2 Stanwix in Brooklyn, NY! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers a spacious and bright living space, perfect for comfortable urban living. Conveniently located just two blocks away from the Myrtle Av Station (J + M + Z) and within half a mile of the Morgan Av Station (L), this newly renovated unit is situated at the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, offering the best of both vibrant neighborhoods. With its prime location, you can reach Manhattan in just 20 minutes.
Inside the apartment, you'll find modern amenities that enhance your lifestyle. The kitchen features a dishwasher, making meal preparation and cleanup a breeze. Whether you're a foodie or enjoy hosting dinner parties, this convenient appliance adds a touch of convenience to your daily routine.
Furthermore, pet owners will be delighted to know that pets are allowed in the building, making it a welcoming and inclusive community for furry friends. The building itself offers additional amenities to enhance your living experience. Laundry facilities are conveniently located within the building, ensuring you can easily take care of your laundry needs without leaving the premises. Additionally, a virtual doorman service provides an added layer of security and convenience, allowing you to feel safe and secure in your new home.
With its spacious layout, desirable location, and modern amenities, 2 Stanwix is the perfect place to call home for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living experience in Brooklyn, NY.

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning & Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First & Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

Easily practice safe social distancing with your own?Private. Unobstructed. Views. Of Manhattan. Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!
Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
